Reviews.Title: Only has one video out BNC
Reviews.Author: Jason N.
Reviews.Content: This unit only has one video out BNC, which means I had to use a BNC splitter in order to view cameras on two different TV's.  Using the splitter has drastically degraded the picture quality.  I realize there is an HDMI out however, unless I use a 50ft HDMI cable, I will not be able to utilize this output.  The menu operation is very cumbersome and the fact that it does not come with a hard drive installed, it is rather expensive in my opinion.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel H.264 video compression format; support 960H & D1 resolution
HDMI output for better resolution
New GUI
PTZ Control
Multiple operation modes (Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance and Mobile monitoring)
USB2.0 backup, upgrade and mouse operation
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime Network DVR with HDMI & VGA for Security Camera System - 960×480 & 30FPS Recording, 11fps WD1 Playback speed. iPhone, Android Viewing (No Hard Drive Installed)
